divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving back to Dallas for Thanksgiving in the early evening but it was already pretty dark, approximately just before 6 PM. I was approximately at mile marker 60 on I-35 (about 20 miles north of Ardmore, OK) I noticed a bright light in the sky and leaned forward to get a better view. I thought at first it was a plane but whatever the object was it was was producing more light than I have seen a plane ever make. It also was not flashing or pulsating light either just shining. I could make out something was inside the light but could not make out a shape. It did look like one end looked like the end of a thin cigar (thinning out towards a tip). After leaning forward I noticed hover for a second longer then it all of a sudden flashed and disappeared completely. The flash was a decent amount brighter than it had been just before. I kept looking after and could not see anything else in the sky. There were no visible stars yet. It was too high to be the top of a tower or any other ground anchored light.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Ardmore
There were no other sightings in Ardmore on or around November 24th 2009
Summary: A bright light with some sort of object and gone with a flash.
